name: Totally Accurate Business Simulator
description:
You're stock brocker. The coin in the middle is a new virtual currency. 

Every click on board is an one market transaction , which raze your funds on 10$

Take care, there are some obstacles, where you can't control your funds. Every second inside restricted area decrease your funds dramatically. 

all white lines represents end of a day. When day goes off, you'll get your money. 

We hope, you could get some pleasure :P
